dmca.title: Official cease and desist
dmca.body:
You using my trademark name is causing consumer confusion and my name is very famous and you are causing delusion and tarnishment to my name. Please cease and desist the use of my name to bring people to your sites. Do not use it in your URL's or titles of your blogs. Do not tarnish my name in any way.
You are breaking the law and posting libelous story to ruin my name and business.
Stop doing this and take down everything with my name on it.

Tarquin Churchwell
